mapper.update: update model set model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fatherid = #{fatherid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, model_url = #{modelUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_createtime = #{modelCreatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, model_createman = #{modelCreateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_updatetime = #{modelUpdatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, model_updateman = #{modelUpdateman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_spare = #{modelSpare,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select model_id, model_name, fatherid, model_url, model_createtime, model_createman, model_updatetime, model_updateman, model_spare from model where model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by model_createtime desc
select model_id, model_name, fatherid, model_url, model_createtime, model_createman, model_updatetime, model_updateman, model_spare from model order by model_createtime desc

select model_id, model_name, fatherid, model_url, model_createtime, model_createman, model_updatetime, model_updateman, model_spare from model where model_name like "%"#{modelName}"%" order by model_createtime desc
